p: The literature describes biodiesel synthesis assays using enzymes immobilized on GA-activated nanoparticles. FAMEs were produced by transesterification of soybean oil with methanol catalyzed by the lipase of Thermomyces lanuginosus immobilized on AMNP-GA [64], with a conversion greater than 90% (30 h, 50 °C, methanol:oil 3:1), and Miao et al. [13] obtained 90% biodiesel with Cal B® immobilized in this way.
